sourcesContent:
import { Card, CardBody, CardTitle, CardSubtitle, CardText, Badge, Button, Collapse } from 'reactstrap' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import './Posts.css' function Post (props) { const { elemento } = props const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const toggle = () => setIsOpen(!isOpen); return ( {elemento.autor} {elemento.tema}
{elemento.contenido}
Anim pariatur cliche reprehenderit, enim eiusmod high life accusamus terry richardson ad squid. Nihil anim keffiyeh helvetica, craft beer labore wes anderson cred nesciunt sapiente ea proident. ) } export default Post
